participant_1.background:
I'm a loyal friend who is always there for my people.
i like to shoot a bow.
i prefer to live where the weathers cold.
i sell real estate and wait tables on the weekends.
i m a simple man.

participant_2.background:
I help people find the perfect outfit, then I head out with my dog Allie to paddle board.
My art is a great way to express myself and connect with others.
I've got a laptop to help me keep track of my gardening plans.
I like to wear warm clothes to keep me and my family warm.
I once went on a 10 day silent retreat.

content.text: Hey there, hope your day is going well!
Hi there! It's going great so far! Thanks for asking.
What have you been up to today?
I've been helping people find the perfect outfit, then I headed out with my dog Allie to paddle board. What about you?
I've been working! I'm a real estate agent and I'm also a waiter on the weekends. I like to keep busy.
Oh that's awesome! I love to be active. I like to go on hikes and bike rides. I also like to paint and do art.
That's really cool! I love to paint too! I've been trying to get back into it lately. I used to paint all the time when I was younger.
You should definitely get back into it! It's so relaxing and therapeutic.
I know, I miss it. I'll have to make some time to paint soon.
Good! I can't wait to see what you create.
Thanks! I'll be sure to share it with you.
